article_title: Double Take 'Toons: Health Care Band-Aid? : NPR
article_text:
Double Take 'Toons: Health Care Band-Aid?

This week, President Obama said that the administration "fumbled" the rollout of the Affordable Care Act, and announced a plan that would allow people receiving cancellation notices to keep their health insurance plans through 2014. Matt Wuerker suggests that the rocky launch of the health care law is nothing next to the regular practices of private insurance, while Randy Bish thinks that the administration is still in denial about the severity of Obamacare's problems.

i toggle caption Matt Wuerker Matt Wuerker
